definition: the "Little Red Book" of selected writings of Mao Zedong (refers to 毛主席語錄|毛主席语录[Mao2 Zhu3 xi2 Yu3 lu4])
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]

sentences.english: Practically everyone has heard of the Little Red Book.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎所有人都聽說過《紅寶書》。

sentences.english: Legend said the book was compiled by Confucius, and is the equivalent to The Red Book of Mao in the modern time.
sentences.chinese: 這本書傳說是孔子編撰的，相當於儒家的紅寶書。

sentences.english: There are a group of Chinese people drawn holding up Mao's famous red book.
sentences.chinese: 畫上有一羣人舉着毛的著名的紅寶書。

sentences.english: This book is called of jurisprudence one's deceased father grind " red treasured book " .
sentences.chinese: 本書被稱爲法理學的考研“紅寶書”。

sentences.english: We name Wal-Mart as Red Treasure Book for Chinese enterprises' development.
sentences.chinese: 把沃爾瑪稱作爲中國企業發展的“紅寶書”。
